version_description:
• Introducing our cleverest new feature: Shake Me Away. Just shake your phone, and we’ll show you deals for a surprise destination.
• We’ve made watchlists more intuitive, making it even easier for you to track price changes.
• Flexible filtering fo

• Hate getting lost? We do too. That’s why we’ve revamped our map interface, launched a Smart Distance Sort for hotels and improved location labeling for car rental pick-ups.
• All of your Trips details are now available offline. That’s 24/7 wherever y

• Our updated notification area gives you more control and flexibility with price alert reminders.
• With one tap you can now call hotels, rental car agencies and even restaurants directly through your Trip events.
• We’ve streamlined our filters to

• Tired of swiping left on dating apps? You’ll fall in love with our new swipe feature on Trips, making it easier to share trips with friends or delete trips that don’t set your heart aflutter.
• Trips can now also be merged, which is a big plus for th

• Tired of swiping left on dating apps? You’ll fall in love with our new swipe feature on Trips, making it easier to share trips with friends or delete trips that don’t set your heart aflutter.
• Trips can now also be merged, which is a big plus for th

• Trips can now also be merged, which is a big plus for th
• Bug fixes.
• Bug fixes.
• Bug fixes.

Scoring the best deal is all about timing, so we've been improving ways for you to monitor prices.

First up, you can access our Watch and Share features simply by swiping right on that dream hotel or ideal flight.

We've also improved the fun

Scoring the best deal is all about timing, so we've been improving ways for you to monitor prices.

First up, you can access our Watch and Share features simply by swiping right on that dream hotel or ideal flight.

We've also improved the fun

Where are your wheels? Our new map view for rental cars will show you how close/far a rental car agency is from your location.

Entering your credit card just got easier as we've worked out a few kinks in our booking flow.

You can now use 3D

We are bringing major updates to Trips in this release:

Have you booked a flight and forgotten to book your hotel? We will now suggest hotels you might want to stay in.
Traveling abroad and unsure whether you will have internet access? Worry no
• Bug fixes.

Already heard about our surprise search feature? You can now literally spin the globe to discover your next spontaneous destination.

Our restyled hotel photo gallery lets you zoom and scroll through stunning photos like a breeze.

Our calenda

For the curious among you, your tracked flights now include the aircraft type.

Ever checked out our 'Today' widgets for Trips and Watchlist? If not, you should. We just gave them a new and shiny look.

Lots of bug fixes and improvements.

Great news for all you travel nerds out there: Trips now includes detailed travel stats for all your past and future journeys. Make sure to show off by sharing them with your friends.

Our Watchlist Today widget now includes all of your watched flig

Unsure about where to go for your next vacation? Try our completely redesigned "Explore" feature to find the cheapest flights to your next destination in a breeze.

Noone likes bugs, so we squashed a ton of them in this update.

Unsure about where to go for your next vacation? Try our completely redesigned "Explore" feature to find the cheapest flights to your next destination in a breeze.

No one likes bugs, so we squashed a ton of them in this update.
• Bug fixes.

KAYAK now shows you the number of available booking options directly on the results screen so that picking your perfect travel option gets even easier.

Searching for a hotel around a specific location? KAYAK now shows you the walking and driving di

Already using Trips to manage all your travel? If not, you should. We just added support for assisted airline check-in. All your details are prefilled so you just have to push the button to get your boarding pass.

Our Explore search now has support

Already using Trips to manage all your travel? If not, you should. We just added support for assisted airline check-in. All your details are prefilled so you just have to push the button to get your boarding pass.

Our Explore search now has support

Booked a flight with a layover? In Trips we now show the travel times and transportation options for your connecting terminals at eligible airports.

KAYAK now uses Apple or Google maps if we don't have terminal maps for the airport you're traveling

No more confusion with additional baggage fees. With our new baggage fee assistant, we will calculate baggage fees into the flight price, so you can book and travel more confidently.

Unsure if prices for that hotel deal may skyrocket soon? Our hote

Booked a hotel and can’t remember if it has a gym or swimming pool? We’ve now added complete hotel amenities lists to Trips, so you’ll never have to wonder whether to pack your bathing suit.

Tracking a flight is simpler than ever. New sorting indic

We are bringing major updates to Trips in this release:

Have you booked a flight and forgotten to book your hotel? We will now suggest hotels you might want to stay in.
Traveling abroad and unsure whether you will have internet access? Worry no

Are you booking last-minute travel? It’s now possible to watch flight, hotel and car offers for the same day.
Do you often book flight tickets with in-lap infants? We now show you the total ticket price instead of the per-person average.
Bug fixes and accessibility improvements.

Don’t know where to go for your next vacation? Select “Anywhere” from the flight destination picker and explore the world.

You can now open PDF boarding passes obtained from assisted check-in with other apps on your device.

Don’t know where to go for your next vacation? Select “Anywhere” from the flight destination picker and explore the world.

You can now open PDF boarding passes obtained from assisted check-in with other apps on your device.
Lots of bug fixes and improvements.
We can all be forgetful with the excitement of a trip. That's why our app now includes Trip Notes for reminders or cool things to do.

Looking for that hotel you stayed in last summer? We now promote your previously booked hotels to the top of our search results and highlight them so that you can find them more easily.

Are you a visual person? If so, you'll be delighted to hear th

We've streamlined our flight fee assistant to make sure you know exactly what's included and what you're going to pay at any time.

Can't seem to find that flight you viewed the other day? You'll now find quick links to your most recently viewed fli

Can't seem to find that flight you viewed the other day? You'll now find quick links to your most recently viewed fli

Whether it's the Bordeaux Wine Country or the Bermuda Triangle, our flight search now supports regions as destinations to ease your travel planning.

We didn't stop there and turned bugs into butterflies.
Just some bug fixes this time, but good things are worth the wait, so hang in there. We have something special planned for you in the next version.
It's party time! To thank you for being a part of our 100th release, we're celebrating with a special game. Try and see if you can make it to first class.

Lots of bug fixes and improvements.

We've optimized our trip synchronization algorithm to ensure that all your trips and notes are always with you no matter where you are.

Flight Tracker now supports push notifications so you never miss an update.
Lots of bug fixes and improvements

Know where to go but not sure when? Our brand new day-of-week flight search will help you figure out the best dates to get to your dream destination.

Have you been around long enough to recall our Packing List feature? Well, if so, you'll be deligh

Looking for a rental car to pick up or drop off near a specific location? Our car search now supports addresses for more relevant results.

Traveling with kids? Our hotel search now allows you to specify your little ones' ages to get more accurate r
Bug fixes and accessibility improvements.

Traveling long-distance? You can now expand the map view on tracked flights to take a closer look at your flight's trajectory.

Saving search results to your Watchlist is now possible directly from the result list.
Bug fixes and accessibility improvements.
Bug fixes and accessibility improvements.

Looking for a place at your destination? We now suggest hotels when you open the app.

Bug fixes and accessibility improvements.

Need a ride? Experience the visually pleasing improvements of our new car rentals map.

Need a flight? Our engineers worked their magic to improve the flights sorting algorithm to ensure the best are always at the top.

Need to measure your ba

Had a great experience with the last flight or car you booked? Our default sorting now highlights your recently booked flights and cars at the top of search results so you can enjoy them again.

As usual, our engineers have also squashed some bugs f
Know where to go but not sure when? We added a nonstop-only filter to our Cheapest Dates flight search so you can figure out the best dates to get to your dream destination directly.
Know where to go but not sure when? We added a nonstop-only filter to our Cheapest Dates flight search so you can figure out the best dates to get to your dream destination directly.
Lots of bug fixes and improvements.

If you love exploring the world, our Explore feature now provides easier to use filters so that you can find your next dream vacation on a budget.

If Cars Special rates made you scratch your head, we have your back. We renamed them to Surprise agen

We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.

Booking flights on a budget? We added colors to our calendar based on ticket price so you can easily find the cheapest dates to fly.

If you feel like giving your account a little more zest, you can now upload a profile picture in Settings.

Booking flights on a budget? We added colors to our calendar based on ticket price so you can easily find the cheapest dates to fly.

If you feel like giving your account a little more zest, you can now upload a profile picture in Settings.

W

If you love exploring the world, our Explore feature is now available in the tab bar at the bottom of the app. No need to hunt for it anymore!

If you are a Booking.com user, you can now use your Booking.com account to sign in to the app.

We've been working hard to get our app ready for iOS 13.

You can now experience the new stylish Dark Mode.

You can now log in to the app using your Apple ID via the new "Sign In with Apple".

If you are a NAVER user, you can now use your NAVER account to sign in to the app.
We fine tuned some things here and there to make sure our app runs even better.

You can now help save the planet by using our new eco-friendly filter to find electric and hybrid cars.

Bug fixes as usual.

Syncing your calendar with your Trips has never been this easy. Siri will now
suggest you to add important events from your Trips, like flights or hotel stays, to your calendar

Tired of repeating the same search filters over and over? So are we. Logged-in users can now easily re-apply recently-used search filters to any flight, hotel, or car search to see the results you care about quicker.

We are travelers - and that doesn't change because we're home. While we all do our part to keep our communities and families safe, at KAYAK we also want to help you explore now, so you can travel later.
We've given our app a fresh new look with easier

We've added a COVID Travel Guide and FAQ section to provide everything you need to know to travel smart and stay safe during the COVID outbreak.

We've added a filter option to find providers that are waiving change fees and offering free cancellati

Booking a car, but can't decide between multiple options? Use the new Policies filter including free cancellation, unlimited mileage and fair fuel policy checkboxes to narrow down your search and book your next rental car with confidence.

Itching to get out of the house? With Road Trip Guides, you can discover new adventures within driving distance!

Have you upgraded to iOS 14 yet? If not, you will be missing out on the following new features:
- Support for approximate location
- Upgrade account to Sign-in With Apple
- A new Price Alerts widget

Have you upgraded to iOS 14 yet? If not, you will be missing out on the following new features:
- Support for approximate location.
- Upgrade account to Sign-in with Apple.
- A new Price Alerts widget.

We added a new filter for searching cars that are deep-cleaned between rentals. These cars are also highlighted in the results list for your convenience.

Hello 2021! We are welcoming the new year with a new version of the app.
- You can now search rental cars based on the type of the car, directly from the app's home screen. Only interested in Minivan rentals? No problem, we got you covered!
- We als
The hotel property type filter received a visual overhaul. You can find the most common property types such as hotels and rentals directly on the Filters screen.

Saving flights, cars or stays while planning your trip just got easier. You can now conveniently manage all saved results for your trip directly from the search screen.

Apart from that, we have of course also squished some bugs to make your app exp

Need a place to stay, and fast? From hotels to guest houses, we now show different categories of accommodation (complete with price estimates) on the Stays tab in Search to help you narrow down where you’re spending the night quicker.
We fixed some bugs here and there to make our app even better.
